title: An Eye for Puns
detail_text: <:th_ch0205/>Wow~ The stars look amazing from here~! It’s so different from Tokyo.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>This is one of Numazu’s best stargazing spots~ Here, have some tea. It can get chilly at night.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Thank you! Don’t mind if I do~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Enjoy.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Oh, I got an idea! I sky with my little eye, a starry night! Ahahaha, now that’s a good one!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, how do you even come up with those puns?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Hmm...... I don’t really know... I guess I could say I have an eye for puns?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Cuz you’re Ai!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0205/>Exactly, exactly!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Maybe I’ll try making some puns, too~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
